parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate. It focuses on domestic violence awareness and support services offered by the Asociatia ANAIS.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and its message is intended to reach a wide audience interested in domestic violence prevention and support.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to raise awareness about domestic violence and promote the services of Asociatia ANAIS. There is no intention to influence the vote in any parliamentary election.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post could be considered a form of public service announcement or social awareness campaign, similar to journalistic efforts to inform the public about important social issues.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post does not express personal opinions but rather factual information about domestic violence and the services offered by the organization.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1800425037446048</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post is a paid advertisement by Asociatia ANAIS, a non-profit organization focused on combating domestic violence.  The content promotes their services and raises awareness about domestic violence. It does not mention any political candidates or parties, nor does it attempt to influence voters in any election. The post's objective is purely social and informational, aiming to reach a wide audience concerned with domestic violence.  Therefore, it does not meet the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006 and Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Asociatia ANAIS</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
